{{ $json.message_original }}

Provide ONLY the summary text, no additional formatting or explanation.

parameters.content:
Fixed Message Processing:
- Messages > 5000 chars get truncated + AI summary
- Original stored in message_original
- Processed version in message column
- Context data properly passed through all nodes
- Fixed item pairing issues after merge

ENHANCEMENT:
- Each message in context now includes database ID
- Added 'was_truncated' flag to indicate if full message is in DB
- Agent can retrieve original messages using ID when needed

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_transcript
(context_id, role, message, message_original) VALUES (
  '{{ String( $('Start').first().json.context_id).replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ String($json.role).replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ String($json.message).replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ String($json.message_original).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'
);

SELECT
  id, context_id, role, message, message_original, created_at, updated_at
FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_transcript
WHERE context_id = '{{ $('Start').first().json.context_id }}'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
  id,
  topic_title,
  topic_summary,
  first_message_id,
  last_message_id,
  message_count,
  created_at
FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_topic_summaries
WHERE context_id = '{{ $('Start').first().json.context_id }}'
  AND last_message_id < (
    SELECT MIN(id) FROM (
      SELECT id FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_transcript
      WHERE context_id = '{{ $('Start').first().json.context_id }}'
      ORDER BY created_at DESC
      LIMIT 10
    ) recent
  )
ORDER BY last_message_id DESC
LIMIT 10;

INSERT INTO {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_contexts
(context_id, context)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.context_id }}',
  COALESCE(
    NULLIF($$
      {{ typeof $json.context === 'string'
          ? $json.context
          : JSON.stringify($json.context || {}) }}
    $$, '')::jsonb,
    '{}'::jsonb
  )
)
ON CONFLICT (context_id) DO UPDATE SET
  context    = EXCLUDED.context,
  "updated_at" = timezone('utc'::text, now());

SELECT id, role, message, created_at
FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_transcript
WHERE context_id = '{{ $('Start').first().json.context_id }}'
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 5;

-- Get current state before update
WITH current_state AS (
  SELECT 
    current_topic_start_id,
    current_topic_name,
    messages_in_current_topic
  FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}topic_state
  WHERE context_id = '{{ $json.context_id }}'
),
last_msg AS (
  SELECT id FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_transcript
  WHERE context_id = '{{ $json.context_id }}'
  ORDER BY created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
-- Insert or update and return info
INSERT INTO {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}topic_state
(context_id, current_topic_start_id, current_topic_name, messages_in_current_topic, last_check_message_id)
SELECT 
  '{{ $json.context_id }}',
  CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.topic_shift_detected }}::boolean THEN (SELECT id FROM last_msg)
    ELSE COALESCE((SELECT current_topic_start_id FROM current_state), (SELECT id FROM last_msg))
  END as new_start_id,
  CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.topic_shift_detected }}::boolean THEN '{{ String($json.suggested_topic_name || "New Topic").replace(/'/g, "''") }}'
    ELSE COALESCE((SELECT current_topic_name FROM current_state), 'Initial Topic')
  END as new_name,
  CASE 
    WHEN {{ $json.topic_shift_detected }}::boolean THEN 1
    ELSE COALESCE((SELECT messages_in_current_topic + 1 FROM current_state), 1)
  END as new_count,
  (SELECT id FROM last_msg)
ON CONFLICT (context_id) DO UPDATE SET
  current_topic_start_id = EXCLUDED.current_topic_start_id,
  current_topic_name = EXCLUDED.current_topic_name,
  messages_in_current_topic = EXCLUDED.messages_in_current_topic,
  last_check_message_id = EXCLUDED.last_check_message_id,
  updated_at = timezone('utc'::text, now())
RETURNING 
  (SELECT current_topic_start_id FROM current_state) as previous_topic_start_id,
  (SELECT current_topic_name FROM current_state) as previous_topic_name,
  (SELECT messages_in_current_topic FROM current_state) as previous_topic_message_count,
  current_topic_start_id,
  context_id,
  {{ $json.topic_shift_detected }}::boolean as topic_shift_detected;

SELECT 
  id,
  role,
  message,
  message_original,
  created_at
FROM {{ $('Start').first().json.table_prefix }}chat_transcript
WHERE context_id = '{{ $json.context_id }}'
  AND id >= {{ $json.previous_topic_start_id }}
  AND id < {{ $json.current_topic_start_id }}
ORDER BY created_at ASC;
